Home Theater vs. Commercial Cinema

Your Home Theater
Commercial Cinema
Convenience
Watch anytime, pause when needed
Fixed showtimes, no pausing
Comfort
Your own seating, temperature control
Shared space, fixed temperature
Cost
No tickets, parking, or concessions
$15+ per person plus extras
Content
Any movie, show, or game
Limited current releases

Home Theater Installation Options

From dedicated theater rooms to multi-purpose spaces, we create the perfect entertainment solution for your home and lifestyle.

New Construction

Built for Perfection

Designed from the Ground Up

Collaborate with your builder to create the ultimate theater experience with optimal room acoustics, power distribution, and equipment placement.

New Construction Advantages:
  • Optimal room dimensions and acoustics
  • Pre-wired for all audio/video equipment
  • Dedicated electrical circuits
  • Built-in acoustic treatments
  • Hidden wiring and equipment
  • Custom seating platforms
  • Integrated lighting control
  • HVAC optimization for equipment
Our Process:
  1. Room design and acoustic planning
  2. Equipment selection and placement
  3. Electrical and low-voltage planning
  4. Construction coordination
  5. Installation and calibration
  6. Final testing and training

Retrofit Solutions Include:

  • Lighting control integration
  • Motorized blackout shading
  • Hidden equipment installation
  • Wireless and wired connectivity
  • Seating recommendations
  • Décor and finishing touches

Popular Retrofit Locations:
  • Basements: Natural darkness, isolated from noise

  • Bedrooms: Personal viewing retreat

Premium Theater Components

Every component is carefully selected and calibrated to work together seamlessly for the ultimate viewing experience.

4K/8K Projection Systems

Experience stunning clarity with the latest projection technology featuring HDR, wide color gamut, and laser light sources.

Features:

  • True 4K and 8K resolution
  • HDR10, HDR10+, and Dolby Vision
  • Laser and LED light sources
  • 20,000+ hour lamp life
  • Motorized lens controls
  • Ultra-short throw options

Premium Brands:

Projection Screens

Professional-grade screens optimized for your projector and room conditions, with motorized operation and perfect image quality.

Screen Options:

  • Motorized drop-down screens
  • Fixed frame screens
  • Acoustically transparent options
  • Ultra-short throw screens
  • Curved screen installations
  • Custom sizes up to 200"

Screen Materials:

  • Standard White: Bright, versatile performance
  • Grey Screens: Enhanced contrast in bright rooms
  • ALR (Ambient Light Rejecting): Optimal for rooms with windows
  • Acoustic: Speakers behind screen for clean aesthetics

Dolby Atmos Surround Sound

Three-dimensional audio that places sounds precisely in space, creating an incredibly immersive listening experience.

Audio Configurations:

  • 5.1.2 Atmos (7 speakers + subwoofer)
  • 7.1.4 Atmos (11 speakers + subwoofer)
  • 9.1.6 Atmos (15 speakers + subwoofer)
  • Custom configurations available
  • In-wall and in-ceiling options
  • Wireless subwoofer placement

Dolby Atmos Benefits:

  • Sound moves around and above you
  • Pinpoint audio placement
  • Enhanced dialogue clarity
  • Immersive gaming audio
  • Compatible with streaming services
  • Future-proof technology

AV Receivers & Processing

The brain of your theater system, processing all audio and video signals with the latest formats and connectivity options.

Processing Features:

  • Dolby Atmos and DTS:X processing
  • 8K HDMI with eARC support
  • Room correction technology
  • Multi-zone audio capability
  • Streaming service integration
  • Voice control compatibility

Connectivity:

  • Multiple 4K/8K HDMI inputs
  • WiFi and Ethernet networking
  • Bluetooth and AirPlay
  • USB media playback
  • Analog and digital audio inputs
  • Control system integration

Acoustic Design & Treatments

Proper acoustics are essential for optimal sound quality. We analyze your room and implement treatments for the best possible audio experience.

Room Acoustic Analysis

What We Analyze:

  • Room dimensions and shape
  • Wall and ceiling materials
  • Flooring and furnishings
  • Window and door placement
  • HVAC noise sources
  • Reverberation time (RT60)

Acoustic Treatment Solutions

Absorption Panels

Reduce echo and reverberation with strategically placed acoustic panels that can be decorative or hidden.

Bass Traps

Control low-frequency buildup in corners and along walls for tighter, more accurate bass response.

Diffusion Panels

Scatter sound reflections to create a more spacious, natural listening environment.

Soundproofing

Isolate your theater from the rest of the house with proper insulation and construction techniques.

Benefits of Proper Acoustic Treatment

Before Treatment

  • Muddy, boomy bass
  • Unclear dialogue
  • Echo and reverberation
  • Uneven sound distribution
  • Noise bleeding to other rooms

After Treatment

  • Tight, controlled bass
  • Crystal-clear dialogue
  • Immersive soundstage
  • Even sound throughout room
  • Isolated theater experience

Integrated Lighting Control

Perfect lighting enhances the theater experience and provides functionality for different activities.

Theater Lighting Zones

Ambient Lighting

Soft, indirect lighting for general room illumination during setup and intermissions.

Pathway Lighting

Low-level floor or step lighting for safe movement during movies without screen glare.

Accent Lighting

Decorative lighting to highlight architectural features, movie posters, or equipment displays.

Task Lighting

Focused lighting for reading, cleaning, or equipment maintenance when needed.

Automated Lighting Scenes

Movie Time

Dims all lights to optimal levels, activates pathway lighting, and creates the perfect viewing atmosphere.

Intermission

Gradually raises ambient lighting for comfort breaks while maintaining theater ambiance.

Cleaning Mode

Full bright lighting for maintenance, cleaning, and equipment access.

Party Mode

Dynamic lighting for social gatherings, gaming, or sports viewing events.

Theater Seating & Design

Comfortable seating and thoughtful design elements complete the luxury theater experience.

Premium Recliners

Luxury leather recliners with power controls, USB charging, and cup holders for ultimate comfort.

  • Power recline and headrest
  • Built-in USB charging
  • LED cup holder lighting
  • Memory foam cushioning
  • Premium leather upholstery

Sectional Seating

Modular sectional seating that can accommodate larger groups while maintaining comfort and style.

  • Modular configuration options
  • Chaise lounge sections
  • Built-in storage
  • Removable cushions
  • Family-friendly design

Couple's Loveseats

Intimate seating for two with shared amenities and romantic theater experiences.

  • Shared center console
  • Dual reclining mechanisms
  • Romantic lighting options
  • Compact footprint
  • Premium materials

Design & Finishing Touches

Carpet & Flooring

Commercial-grade carpet with sound absorption properties and easy maintenance for high-traffic areas.

Wall Treatments

Fabric wall coverings, wood paneling, or decorative acoustic panels that enhance both aesthetics and sound quality.

Ceiling Design

Coffered ceilings, star field lighting, or acoustic ceiling treatments that add visual interest and improve acoustics.

Décor & Accessories

Movie posters, concession stands, popcorn machines, and other themed accessories to complete the cinema experience.

Professional Installation Process

1

Design Consultation

We assess your space, understand your preferences, and create a custom theater design that maximizes your room's potential.

2

Acoustic Analysis

Professional acoustic measurement and treatment planning ensure optimal sound quality in your specific room.

3

Equipment Installation

Certified technicians install all components with attention to detail, ensuring clean wiring and optimal placement.

4

Calibration & Testing

Professional calibration of all audio and video components ensures perfect picture and sound quality.

5

User Training

Comprehensive training on all system features ensures you can enjoy your theater to its fullest potential.
